description: The National Car Testing Service (NCTS) has suspended the use of vehicle lifts used in its testing centres.
title: Irish car test service to carry out checks on lifts
title_page: Irish car test service to carry out checks on lifts - BBC News
maintext: "All customers should continue to book and turn up for their NCT as normal. The test will be completed with the omission of the under body inspection, which will be conducted at a later date when the lifts are returned to use."
